loans.name: Denis

texts.en:
Denis is 32 years old. He is married and has three children. He and his wife earn their income through the sale of crops and livestock. They grow maize, beans, pineapples and coffee. They have cows, goats, and chickens. They also own a small shop where they sell commodities.

Denis looks forward to becoming a Community Knowledge Worker (CKW). As a CKW he will use the materials in his business-in-a-box (smartphone, solar charging set and weighing scale) to disseminate vital agricultural information to the other members of his village, helping them to improve their crop yields and to increase their incomes.  

With the additional money that he will earn as a CKW, Denis will pay his family's rent. He dreams of someday building his own house.

loans.use: to purchase a mobile phone, a solar charging set, and a weighing scale so that he may provide vital farming information to his community.

loans.name: Kisa Kya Mukamama Group

texts.en:
Annet is 38 years old, a member of Kisa Kya Mukamama group and a widow whose husband was murdered in 2009.  She was left with her six children of which three go to school.
Annet operates a small restaurant along the Northern bypass where she earns a living for her family. She started this job in 1996 as supplement to the husband’s income before he passed on. Annet’s major clients are boda boda (a cycle equipped with a passenger seat) cyclists, builders and passers by along the road.
Her dream is to see her children successfully finishing school and getting good jobs.
Her major challenge is lack of capital which slows down the growth of her business. This does not only affect her business but also her family’s standard of living since she’s now the family bread winner.
Annet is very hardworking, social and honest. She will use the loan to buy utensils and food items for her restaurant in order to earn enough income to support her family and educate her children up to higher institutions of learning.The eleventh member at the back(second from the right) in the picture is the Ugafode Credit officer.

loans.use: To buy utensils and food items for the restaurant

loans.name: Teresia

texts.en:
Teresia, 49, describes herself as an enterprising, happy, hardworking, and very responsible woman. She lives with her family in the town of Msambweni.

Teresia works selling petroleum from her home in plastic containers. She has been in this business for several years. She wants to start a new business selling water. She says that she wants to dig a borehole, for which she is asking for a loan in the amount of 50,000 Kenya shillings (KES).

Teresia thanks you in advance for the support you are giving her.

loans.use: to dig a borehole.

loans.name: Bakari

texts.en:
Bakari is a 39-year-old married man. He has four children. He describes himself to be social man. 

Bakari operates a retail business where he provides refrigerator repair services. He has been involved in this business for 7 years. His business is located within a potential business area and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business.

He will use the 20,000 Kenya shilling (KES) loan to buy refrigerators spare parts. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years. This is his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy refrigerator spare parts.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a dairy cow

loans.name: Elizabeth

texts.en:
Elizabeth is a forty-one-year-old single woman. She is blessed with one child who is seventeen years old. She operates a grocery store in Kiambu and has been in this business for twelve years now. She gets a monthly income of ninety thousand shillings.

This will be Elizabeth's second loan with KADET LTD, and she plans to use the entire loan to buy bags of onions and potatoes to sell. 

In the future, she wants to be a successful business woman.

loans.use: To buy bags of onions and potatoes

loans.name: Grover

texts.es:
Grover de 54 años, es un hombre que siempre esta activo, le gusta mucho sentirse útil y trabajar para la manutención de su familia y brindarles las mejores condiciones de vida, es soltero pero tiene 4 hijos de 23, 21, 20 y 14 años de edad respectivamente, él trabaja mucho pues desea otorgarles un futuro mejor.
Grover se dedica a trabajar como obrero de construcción. Cuando algún vecino, conocido o cliente nuevo desea realizar una edificación como construir una pared, forjar una casa o implementar con nuevos cables y seguridad sus instalaciones eléctricas, no dudan en llamar de inmediato a Grover ya que su trabajo se basa principalmente en realizar construcciones de casas y electrificar las mismas. Lleva realizando este trabajo por 2 años de manera independiente ya que antes de eso trabajaba bajo la autoridad de otras personas y fue de esta forma como aprendió y ganó mucha experiencia para poder hacerlo ahora con mucho esmero y responsabilidad. 
Le esta yendo muy bien, tiene muchos contratos y siempre realiza su trabajo con resultados óptimos y con todos los implementos de seguridad que requiere ya que no desea generar o sufrir accidentes que lamentar, tiene sus ingresos regulados de acuerdo a los trabajos que hace, tiene autonomía en su economía, desea seguir trabajando e implementando con herramientas y equipos que le permitan realizar su trabajo con mayor rapidez.
Por ello solicita 1,000 mil soles para comprar herramientas como desarmador, martillo y pistola para soldar, los cuales necesita para continuar con su trabajo.
texts.en:
Grover, 54 years old, is a man who is always active. He likes feeling useful and working to maintain his family and provide them with the best living conditions. He is unmarried but has four children, who are 23, 21, 20 and 14 years old, respectively. He works hard since he wants to give them a better future.

Grover is a construction worker. When some neighbor, acquaintance or new client wants to have some construction done, like building a wall, framing a house or safely installing new cables and electrical systems, they do not hesitate to immediately call for Grover because his work is principally that of building houses and installing electricity in them. He has been doing this work for two years as an independent contractor because before that he was working for other people and that was how he learned and gained a lot of experience so that he can now branch out on his own carefully and responsibly.

He is doing very well now. He has a lot of contracts and always does the work himself with optimal results and with all the safety tools required because he does not want to cause or suffer from lamentable accidents. He regulates his income according to the work he does. He now has control over his finances. He wants to continue working and stocking tools and equipment that will enable him to do his work quickly. Consequently he is requesting S/.1,000 to purchase tools, such as a screwdriver, hammer and welding gun, which he needs to continue with his work.

loans.use: to purchase tools, such as a screwdriver, hammer and welding gun.

loans.name: Blanca Rosibel

texts.es:
La señora Blanca de 28 años de edad, vive con su conyugue, en casa de un familiar en la comunidad de San Lorenzo, al sur de Honduras, se dedica desde hace 4 años al negocio de venta de ropa nueva y calzado para damas y caballeros, también trabaja como maestra de computación en una escuela. Su venta la realiza en su local ubicado en el mercado nuevo de San Lorenzo.
Doña Blanca está solicitando 20,000.00 para la compra de ropa para dama, caballeros y niños y zapatos ya que se acerca la temporada de navidad y desea surtir su negocio.
Doña Blanca con el apoyo de este préstamo pretende suplir la necesidad de financiamiento para surtir su negocio y de esta manera tener mejores ganancias y mejorar un poco su condición de vida.
Doña Blanca su sueño es tener su casa propia.
San Lorenzo, Honduras - Octubre del 2012.
texts.en:
Blanca is 28 years old and lives with her husband in a relative’s house in San Lorenzo, in the southern part of Honduras.  She has been selling new men’s and women’s clothing and shoes for four years.  She also works as a computer teacher at a school.  She makes her sales from a stall in the San Lorenzo market.

Blanca is asking for 20,000 to buy clothing and shoes for men, women, and children, now that the Christmas season is approaching.

Blanca will use this loan to supply her business and in this way have better earnings and improve her living conditions a little.  Her dream is to have her own home.

loans.use: to buy merchandise.

loans.name: Hans

texts.es:
Hans, de 33 años, es un hombre bueno y amable, es conviviente con Marisela con quien tiene un hijo de 9 años, vive en casa de sus padres a lado de su pareja, además de ellos también comparte esa casa con sus tres hermanos, él aporta mucho a su hogar y todo lo que hace, lo hace pensando en el bienestar de su familia.
El trabajo de Hans consiste en brindar servicio mecánico, tiene un taller de motos y de mototaxis en donde da solución a problemas técnicos como soldaduras, parchado de llantas, centrado de aros, cambio de aceites y otros. Su taller está ubicado en una zona de gran afluencia del público y trabaja a lado de sus hermanos. Lleva desarrollando esta labor desde hace 3 años y está contento porque hace lo que le gusta y porque además puede generar ingresos económicos para su familia. Le gusta mucho lo que hace, en especial que puede usar su tiempo como el lo desee, además le agrada trabajar con sus hermanos, asegura que al principio tenía muchos problemas pues no se acostumbraba a trabajar entre fierros y aceite, pero con el tiempo se dio cuenta que era una gran labor y ahora siente que no lo cambiaría por nada, por el momento lo que mas desea es implementar sus herramientas de trabajo para desarrollar mejor su labor. Ahora solicita un monto de 1,500 soles, para comprar una máquina de soldar además de algunas herramientas para implementar su taller.
texts.en:
Hans is 33 years old and a good and friendly man.  He lives with Marisela with whom he has a 9 year old son.  He lives in his parents' home with his partner, and they also share the house with his three siblings.  He contributes a lot to the household, and everything he does is with the wellbeing of his family in mind.

Hans' job is a mechanic's service, and he has a motorcycle shop and mototaxi repairs business where he repairs technical problems like soldering, patching tires, realignments, oil changes, and others. His shop is located in a very affluent area of the city, and he works beside his brothers.  He has been fostering this business for the past three years, and he is happy because he is doing something he enjoys and also because he is able to bring home an income for his family. He really likes his work, especially in that he can use his time as he wishes, and it suits him to work with his siblings.  HE says that in the beginning he had many problems because he wasn't used to working among all the oils and metal pieces, but with time, he came to feel that he was doing important work, and now he wouldn't trade it for anything.  At this time, what he really wants to do is to get more tool for his work so that he can better develop his business.  He is asking for 1,500 Soles to buy a soldering machine and some other tools with which to expand his shop.

loans.use: to buy a soldering machine and also some tools to open his shop.

loans.name: Daniel Augusto

texts.es:
Daniel es un joven de 23 años de edad, vive en la cálida y alegre ciudad de Pucallpa, al lado de sus padres a quienes ama muchísimo y por quienes se esfuerza mucho cada día para que se sientan muy orgullosos de él. Daniel es un joven muy trabajador y sobre todo con muchas ganas de salir adelante. Día con Día Daniel trabaja como asistente en una pequeña empresa de su ciudad y con el fruto de su trabajo apoya con los gastos de su hogar y con el pago de sus estudios, ya que actualmente el acaba de culminar su carrera de administración, Daniel cree que le va bien en su trabajo porque es muy responsable y sobre todo porque sus ganas de salir adelante.

Daniel está muy agradecido con los prestatarios Kiva ya que gracias a la ayuda que le han brindado el podrá solventar los gastos de su tesis, de esta manera el podrá tener su título profesional y poder buscar un mejor trabajo y luchar por hacer realidad su más grande sueño:” Ser un gran profesional y seguir apoyando a sus padres”.
texts.en:
Daniel is a young man of 23 years who lives in the happy and hot city of Pucallpa with his parents, who he loves deeply, and for whom he works hard every day so that they will be proud of him. Daniel is a very hardworking young man, and above all, he has a real desire to get ahead in life. Day by day, Daniel works as an assistant in a small business in his city, and with the earnings from his work, he helps out with the household expenses and the payment for his studies. He is currently nearing the end of his degree program in the field of Business Administration, and Daniel thinks it is going well because he is very responsible and because he really wants to succeed.

Daniel is very thankful to the lenders at Kiva because thanks to the help they have given him, he will be able to cover the costs of his thesis work.  In this manner, he will get his professional degree and will be able to look for a better job and continue on to reach his greatest dream, "to be a white-collar worker and continue helping out his parents."

loans.use: to pay for his professional thesis.

loans.name: Jose Rafael

texts.es: José reside en casa propia junto a su esposa y tres hijos, él es una persona muy conocida en la zona y cuenta con muy buenas referencias ya que es responsable y honesto. José posee muchos años trabajando como jornal en su propio terreno, sembrando maíz y frijoles, así mismo se dedica a la venta, crianza y compra de ganado vacuno, con lo que ha logrado salir adelante. Él solicita un préstamo para prepararse para la siguiente época de siembra, de modo que cuente con todo lo necesario como: semillas, pesticidas, abono y otros más. Así también comprara un novillo para aumentar su ganado el cual le deja ganancias muy buenas. José es muy trabajador y cuenta con grandes deseos de superarse y darle lo mejor a su familia.
texts.en:
José lives in his own home with his wife and three children. He is well-known in his area and has good credit references who indicate that he is responsible and honest. José has worked many years as a farmer on his own land, growing corn and beans. He sells what he produces, but he also raises and sells cattle, which has allowed him to get ahead.

José is requesting a loan so that he can prepare for the next planting season. The loan will provide everything he needs including seeds, pesticides, compost, and other supplies. He will also buy a steer so that he can increase his cattle herd and generate more income.

José is a hardworking individual who has great dreams of succeeding and providing the best for his family.

loans.use: to buy farming supplies and a steer.

loans.name: America

texts.es:
América, de 54  años de edad, es una mujer con muchas ganas de salir adelante y brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia. Está casada con Julio quien es empleado y padre de sus 2 hijos. Juntos  están cómodamente instalados en su propia casa en compañía de su hijo menor Luís de 12 años de edad. La actividad que realiza América es la venta de comidas por las noches como “juanes” que es arroz envuelto en hojas, pescados asados, tallarines y otros. Para eso instala una mesa en el frontis de su casa donde atiende muy amablemente a todos sus clientes que en su mayoría son sus vecinos y transeúntes de la zona. 
Comenta que ha suspendido temporalmente sus actividades por problemas de salud, pero lo estará retomando en el transcurso de las semanas.
Lleva más de 6 años en éste negocio, empezando con un capital propio, luego fue creciendo con préstamos. Considera a su negocio bastante rentable por la demanda que tiene ya que en su zona es muy conocida y solicitada, siendo sus vecinas quienes le piden que retome su negocio. 
Por tanto, viendo lo rentable que es su negocio, y los pedidos que tiene, desea empezar y continuar hasta hacerlo crecer y en un futuro poder abrir una cebichería ya que le gusta la cocina. Por tanto solicitará un crédito para concretar  sus planes. Asimismo se compromote en ser responsable con el pago de sus cuotas.
Con el monto solicitado de 2000 nuevos soles, lo invertirá en la compra de utensilios para su negocio como ollas, vasos, platos, y otros, además de mesas y sillas, también ingredientes necesarios para la preparación de sus comidas buscando precios bajos por sus compras al contado y en volumen.
texts.en:
América, 54, is a woman who really wants to get ahead and provide a better quality of life for her family. She is married to Julio who works and is the father of her two children. Together they live comfortably in their own home with their younger child Luís, aged 12. América's work is selling food in the evenings, such as “juanes” (rice wrapped in leaves), grilled fish, noodles and other things. To do this she puts up a table outside her house, where she serves her customers in a friendly manner. Her customers are mainly neighbours and passers-by.
She says she has had to stop working temporarily for health reasons, but she will be starting up again in the weeks to come.
She has been running this business for more than six years, and started with her own capital, later growing her business through loans. She thinks her business is quite profitable because she is in demand and is well known and sought-after in her area. Her neighbours have been asking her to start up again. 
In light of how profitable her business is and the orders she receives, she would like to start and continue to grow her business, and in the future be able to open a ceviche restaurant as she likes cooking. For this reason she has asked for the loan to firm up her plans. She also is committed to being responsible with the re-payment terms. With the 2000 nuevos soles she has requested, she will invest in the purchase of utensils for her business, such as pans, glasses, plates and other things, as well as chairs and tables and also ingredients that she needs to prepare her dishes. She seeks out low prices for her purchases by paying in cash and buying in bulk.

loans.use: to buy pans, glasses, plates and other things, as well as chairs and tables and also ingredients to prepare food.

loans.name: Alayan

texts.en:
Alayan is a 47-year-old married man from Lebanon. He lives with his wife and their three children. All of his children attend school.

He is the main source of income for his family. Since 2000, he has owned and operated a café in his town. At his café, he serves hubble-bubble, soft drinks and many other products. People visit him from all over the neighboring villages to enjoy their time with friends.

Now, he is looking to borrow a loan from Kiva partner Ameen s.a.l to purchase Sanita paper products, soft drinks and many other items. In the future, he plans to borrow another Kiva loan so he can build a snack shop beside his café, where he would be able to serve customers seeking to eat a small meal.

loans.use: to expand and improve his café by purchasing paper products, additional soft drinks and many other items

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.es:
Yolanda, de 36 años es una mujer dedicada a su familia. Vive en compañía de Richard, su esposo desde hace 12 años. Ambos tienen 3 hijos menores a los que cuidan en la casa que cuida desde hace 14 años. 
Hace poco cerró su tienda de comestibles, que abrió con mucho esfuerzo. Pues se dedicó a su familia en cuerpo y alma, sin descuidar sus objetivos. Mientras su esposo trabaja como albañil construyendo casa y realizando acabados de calidad, según cuenta gana muy bien en su oficio. “Todo depende de la contrata que asume con los clientes”, afirma. A más tiempo que se demore en realizar la construcción, gana más. Pero como es un hombre responsable, trabaja los fines de semana con un motocarro, en el trasporte público, donde gana un dinero extra. Pero como es una mujer trabajadora, hace poco abrió un pequeño puesto de venta de golosinas en una calle céntrica de la ciudad. por tanto solicitará un credito en MFP para comprar de golosinas para abastecer su negocio en esta temporada donde hay mayor venta.
texts.en:
Yolanda is a 36-year old woman who is dedicated to her family.  She lives with Richard, her husband of 12 years.  They have 3 minor children, whom they care for in the house where she has been living for 14 years.

She recently closed her grocery store that she had opened with much effort, so that she could focus on her family with body and soul, and without distraction.  Meanwhile, her husband works as a builder, constructing houses and executing quality finishes, and earns good money in his position.  "It all depends on the contract he has with the client," she states.  The longer it takes to complete the construction, the more he earns. But as he is a responsible man, he works weekends offering public transportation with a three-wheeler van, which earns him extra money.

Since Yolanda is a hard-working woman, she recently opened a small candy stall on street in the center of the city.  This is why she asked for the loan from MFP to be able to purchase cookies to stock her store in this season of increased sales.

loans.use: to buy candies and sweets to stock her business during this season of high sales.

loans.name: Sonia

texts.es: Esta mujer humilde y muy trabajadora de nombre Sonia, está casada, y vive con su esposo actualmente, ella solicito un préstamo con el cual pretende comprar frijoles para sembrar, y productos para darle asistencia al mismo como abonos, que fortalecen el crecimiento de la planta, eh insecticidas que no permiten k ningún insecto pueda provocar daños a la producción,, puesto que ella tiene la fe de que esta actividad económica le genere ganancias a futuro, y así poder sostener su hogar, ya que los ingresos k esta familia tiene, no son suficientes para poder solventar todas sus necesidades, por lo que ella solicito un crédito, y es el primer  préstamo que ha  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Ella no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en: This humble and hard-working woman, Sonia, is married and currently lives together with her husband. She is requesting a loan which she will use to purchase beans for planting, and products such as fertilizers, which will help her plants grow strong, and insecticides, which will prevent insects from damaging her harvest. Sonia has faith that this economic venture will generate future income and be able to support her home, as the current income that the family has is insufficient to meet all of their needs. This is the first loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. She has not received any prior loans from state banks, but FUDECOSURE has been able to provide her with a better arrangement and an interest rate that is much lower.

loans.use: to purchase beans.

loans.name: Manuel Isabel

texts.es: Manuel, es una persona que ha sabido aprovechar las bendiciones y oportunidades que la vida le ha brindando, ya que desde que nació reside en el mismo lugar, siendo un terreno bastante grande el cual su familia ha ido heredando por generaciones y que es muy fértil para sembrar y criar animales. Manuel se dedica a la agricultura de maíz y frijoles y así mismo trabaja criando cerdos, los cuales posteriormente comercializa con diferentes personas distribuidoras de carne. Él vive junto a sus hijos y su madre de muy avanzada edad a quien desea darle todo lo mejor, razón por la que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL con el cual pueda comprar cerdos de engorde para criar y posteriormente vender, ya que en estos últimos días del años la demanda crece y él quiere contar con todo lo necesario para aprovechar la temporada.
texts.en:
Manuel is someone who knows how to make the most of the blessings and opportunities life has offered him. Ever since he was born, he has resided in the same place, a rather large plot of land that has belonged to his family for generations and is very fertile for farming and raising animals.

Manuel works growing corn and beans and also raises pigs, which he later sells to different meat distributors. He lives with his children and his mother, who is very elderly, and he wants to give her all the best. That is why he is requesting a loan from Intergal, so that he can purchase pigs to raise, fatten, and eventually sell, beacuse demand increases toward the end of the year and he wants to have everything he needs in order to make the most of the season.

loans.use: to purchase pigs to sell.

loans.name: Waleed

texts.en:
Waleed is a 47-year-old married man from Hebron. He and his wife have seven children: three boys and four girls. Two of their children attend school.

Since 2008, he has owned and operated a shop where he sells electronic goods.

He is seeking a loan through Ryada in order to buy electrical goods such as lightbulbs, light fixtures, and cables, and a machine which identifies electrical problems. He hopes that the loan proceeds will help him increase sales and income so that he can provide his children with a better life.

loans.use: to expand and improve his business by purchasing electrical goods (e.g., lightbulbs, light fixtures, and cables) and a machine to identify electrical problems

loans.name: Nana

texts.en:
Nana is 30 years old and lives in Margibi County in Liberia. Her county is noted for both producing rubber (from plantations) and fishing (the county is situated on the coast of Liberia). She is a high school graduate and has two children: a 3-year-old and an 11-year-old. Both of her children are in school and live at home.

For the past eighteen years, she been selling used clothes at the local market. She explains that she began her career by selling kola nuts around town and that she learned how to do so from her mother, which is one thing that makes her proud of her business. Everyday she makes some profits because she sells quality used clothing.

She is now requesting a loan to purchase more used clothes for her business. In the near future, she hopes to build a house and to better educate her children.

loans.use: to expand and improve her business by purchasing additional inventory of used clothes.

loans.name: Mohammad

texts.en:
Mohammad is 21 years old, and from Gaza. He has owned a food stall in the food market, for selling fruits and vegetables, since 2011.

Mohammad asked Ryada for this Youth Loan in order to buy a small automobile for transportation, to minimize the cost of transporting produce to his stall in the market. He hopes that this loan will minimize his costs, and thus improve his income.

loans.use: to buy a small automobile, for transporting produce to his stall in the food market.

loans.name: Fatuma

texts.en:
Fatuma wants to increase her sales at this time of year when there is more demand. She operates a food stall where she sells a variety of dishes for breakfast and lunch. Fatuma wants to have ingredients in stock so she is asking for this loan to buy wheat flour, sugar, rice, beans and vegetables, among other ingredients.

Her dream is to have a hotel so that she can increase sales.

loans.use: to buy wheat flour, sugar, rice, beans and vegetables to make food to sell

loans.name: Korto

texts.en: Korto is 35 years and lives in Airport along with her husband and six children between the ages of 4 and 17. Her children are in school and live at home. For seven years, she has been operating a local restaurant in her community where she serves delicious Liberian dishes. She is requesting a loan to buy more rice, pepper, palm oil, fish and other items for her business. Her dreams are to expand her business and send her children to school.

loans.use: to buy more rice, pepper, palm oil, fish and other items

loans.name: Jemal

texts.en:
Jemal is 36 years old. He lives with his wife and two children (2 and 4 years old) in Batumi city. In fact, the family doesn't have a source of income and they live in poverty. So, Jemal decided to move to his village and rent his house to get a monthly income. He requested a loan from local financial institutions for the business start-up without any success. His loan request was rejected because of his low income and lack of experience in the business, which is usually demanded by local credit providers. 

His loan request was approved as part of the new joint initiative between Kiva and Credo. The start-up loan program envisages providing business start-up and re-startup credits with soft conditions to country rural poor who do not have access to credit products, being regarded as “high risk borrowers” because of low income. With the loan, Jemal will cover the costs of installing natural gas piping inside his house. After the house is provided with natural gas for heating and cooking, Jemal will be able to rent his house at a good price. The new business initiative, financed with the Kiva Start-up loan, will increase his monthly income and Jemal will improve the living conditions for his family.

loans.use: To install natural gas pipes in his house

loans.name: Amina

texts.en:
Amina is a sociable, patient lady who likes helping other people. She’s divorced with no children.  She lives in the rural area of the town of Msambweni.

She has a clothing selling business, having started it to be able to meet her household needs. Her income is not enough to provide for a good quality of life. 

This will be her first loan through Yehu, and she will use it to buy bales of clothing for sale, now that the Christmas season is approaching. She wants to take advantage of the season and generate a good income through her sales. This will allow her to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy bales of clothing for sale

loans.name: Mrisa

texts.en:
Mrisa is a 32-year-old married man. He has four children with ages ranging from 3 years to 12 years. He describes himself to be an honest man. He operates a retail store where he sells charcoal. He has been involved in this business for 3 years. His business is located within a viable business area and his primary customers are local residents. 

He describes his biggest business challenge to be high transportation cost. He will use the Kes 100,000 loan to buy charcoal to sell. His business goal is to improve his business within 5 years. He hopes that in the future, he will have had improved his business. This is his third loan with SMEP DTM after  a previous one of Kes 50,000 which he managed to repay successfully.

loans.use: to buy charcoal

loans.name: Herodia

texts.en:
Herodia is a married lady aged 32 years old and a mother to four children who are aged between 12 years and 4 months old.  She buys and sells cereals in a Kapsabet market and her business has been in operation for the past 4 years, earning a monthly income of Kes 18,000.  

She is servicing her third term loan of Kes 40,000 from KADET LTD after she repaid the previous loans successfully.  She plans to use the loan advanced to her to purchase more dry cereals. The profits she earns will be used to repay the loan and pay school fees for her school-going children.  

She hopes for prosperity in her business.

loans.use: To purchase dry cereals for resale

loans.name: Natalia

texts.es:
Natalia de 49 años comparte una vida conyugal con Julio de 55 años, ambos comparten un tiempo considerable juntos teniendo como fruto del amor a sus 4 hijos: Alfredo, Reyna, Edwin y Ruth. Radican en una vivienda construida a base de material noble. Es una mujer de arduo trabajo y esfuerzo dedicada al mantenimiento y producción de cacao, lleva 20 años desempeñándose como tal en unas parcelas que adquirió días después de haber contraído matrimonio. Como es de saberse las actividades en el campo son muy arduas y agotadoras, es por ello que en mas de una ocasión es necesario contar con apoyo y mano de obra adicional por parte de los jornaleros del lugar ya que el culminar en un periodo breve con las tareas pendientes aportan a favor de lograr a fin de temporada frutos de calidad debido a la atención prestada del caso. Considera que todo ello tiene sentido puesto que al realizar el expendio a los acopiadores del lugar es posible obtener buenas ganancias que en lo posterior ayudan a mantener la economía familiar de manera estable.
De acuerdo a los estudios técnicos brindados por una institución del rubro vio en sus parcelas cierto déficit con respecto  a las sombras que requieren las plantaciones de cacao para desarrollar las mazorcas de manera estable, es por ello que requiere de inmediato instalar plantaciones de árboles de sombra temporal y rápido crecimiento como es el plátano, para ello requiere contar con personal que apoyen a ella y su esposo en la respectiva tarea , adicional a ello debe realizar un mantenimiento y el deshierbo de la maleza que compiten por los nutrientes. Tiene en mente realizar a futuro la compra de un lote de terreno en la ciudad y construir una vivienda para beneficio de sus hijos, pues ya se encuentran en edad escolar y considera es bueno brindarles una educación de calidad que solo se halla en la zona urbana de su localidad. Este viene a ser su crédito número cuatro, es posible decir que desde que inició a ser parte de MFP ha tenido cierta tranquilidad en cuanto a inversión inmediata en sus parcelas pues considera una gran ayuda para un trabajo fluido. Espera que su grupo comunal sea siempre un grupo unido y con orientación responsable.
Con los 2,000 nuevos soles realizará la compra de herramientas y semillas de árboles para sombra temporal de sus sembríos así como el pago de jornaleros para las distintas tareas de deshierbo y deschuponado de sus plantaciones.
texts.en:
Natalia is 49 years old and shares her married life with Julio who is 55. They have been together for a considerable length of time, and their loving relationship has produced 4 children: Alfredo, Reyna, Edwin and Ruth. Their home was built using quality construction materials. 

She is a tireless worker and puts a lot of effort and dedication into her work caring for and producing cacao. She has been doing this kind of work for 20 years on plots of land that she acquired in the days after their wedding. As many people know, working in the fields is both arduous and exhausting. For this reason, on more than one occasion it has been necessary to get additional support and help from local labourers. With their assistance unfinished tasks can be completed quickly. This can result in a higher quality harvest by the end of the season due to the attention given to the crop. She believes that this makes sense because when she sells her goods to the local middlemen she can make good earnings. This in turn helps stabilise her family’s economic situation.

Following the technical studies carried out by the institution expert in the field, she noticed that her plots of land did not offer the shade required in order for the cacao plants to develop strong pods. For this reason she must plant trees immediately that will give temporary shade and grow quickly, such as the banana tree. This is why she must take on extra staff, to support her and her husband with this task. She must also weed the plots, as the weeds compete with the crops for nutrients, and carry out other crop maintenance work. 

In the future she plans to buy land in the city and to build a house there for her children. They are school age now and she thinks it is good to give them a quality education which would only be available in the urban part of her area. This will be her fourth loan. It can be said that she has had great peace of mind since she joined MFP as there is money available to invest in her land and that helps her work run smoothly. She hopes that her group will always be united and keep its responsible attitude.

With the 2,000 Nuevos Soles she will buy tools and tree seeds to provide temporary shade for her fields, as well as pay the labourers for their work on different weeding and pruning tasks.

loans.use: to buy tools, tree seeds, and to pay labourers

loans.name: Ketilut

texts.es:
Ketilut tiene 36 años, es una mujer emprendedora y amante del trabajo, tiene 3 hijos de 18, 10 y 2 años de edad junto a su conviviente llamado Angel, vive junto a toda su familia en una casa propia que construyeron como resultado de muchos años de trabajo, esfuerzo y ahorro. Ama a cada uno de los miembros de su hogar y es a ellos a quienes les dedica todo el esfuerzo que hace para seguir adelante. El negocio de Ketilut consiste en la venta de abarrotes y productos de primera necesidad, todos los días desde muy temprano abre las puertas de su tienda para atender a sus clientes que llegan hasta su establecimiento en busca de algún producto con la seguridad que ahí encontrarán lo que necesitan. Su bodega es la más surtida de su barrio y sus clientes no dudan en comprarle, no solo por ese motivo, sino también por la calidad de las marcas de los artículos que ofrece, además de eso el trato tan cordial y la amabilidad que expresa en cada una de sus palabras son la cualidades perfectas para que sus clientes estén siempre agradecidos. Lleva en este negocio 10 años y siempre recibe la ayuda de su cónyuge e hijos.
Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es conversar con sus clientes y verlos empezar el día con una sonrisa, considera que lo más difícil es tener que levantarse temprano para atender su bodega y complementarlo con la crianza de su pequeño bebé, aún cuando se siente cansada, sin embargo, sabe que es su trabajo y que tiene que hacerlo, espera que más adelante su negocio crezca y le brinde mejores ingresos económicos. Este es el crédito número 18 con MFP, es por eso que agradece a todas las personas que hacen posible su crédito para continuar realizando su trabajo con mejores resultados. Por otro lado se compromete una vez mas a cumplir con el pago puntual de sus cuotas como lo hizo en anteriores créditos que tuvo. Además le agrada ser parte de su banco comunal por que todos los integrantes son personas responsables y muy solidarias.
Con el monto solicitado (S/. 2000), comprará mayor cantidad de productos con los que implementará su tienda de abarrotes como arroz, azúcar, huevos, fideos, verduras, frutas y otros artículos.
texts.en:
Ketilut, age 36, is an enterprising woman who enjoys her work. She has three children (ages 18, 10, and 2) with her partner Angel. Ketilut and her entire family live in a house that they built after many years of work, effort, and savings. She loves every member of her family, so she does everything she can to help them move forward. Ketilut’s business involves selling groceries and basic necessities. Every day, she opens the doors of her business during the early hours so that she can attend to her customers who arrive at her establishment in need of some products. They are confident that they will find what they need. Her store is the best-stocked establishment in the neighborhood, so her customers have no hesitation in buying from her. In addition, her customers enjoy the quality of the product brands that she offers and the friendliness expressed through each of her kind words. Her customers are always appreciative of these qualities. Ketilut has been in business for 10 years and always receives assistance from her partner and children.

What she enjoys most about her work is being able to converse with her customers and begin each day with a smile. She considers the most difficult part to be waking up early so that she can attend to her store while taking her care of her baby. Even when she feels tired, Ketilut knows that she has a job to do. She expects to grow her business going forward so that she can generate more income.

This is her 18th loan with MFP. For this reason, she is grateful to everyone who made this loan possible so that she can continue her work and achieve better results. Once again, she promises to complete her payments on time just as she did with her previous loans. Ketilut also appreciates being part of her Communal Bank because the other members are responsible and supportive people. The loan she requested in the amount of 2,000 PEN will be used to buy a large quantity of products to keep her grocery store in operation such as rice, sugar, eggs, noodles, vegetables, fruits, and other items.

loans.use: to buy rice, sugar, eggs, noodles, vegetables, fruits, and other items.

loans.name: Maria

texts.es:
María, de 70 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y luchadora, está casada hace muchos años y junto a  su esposo tiene 5 hijos, vive en su casa propia únicamente con su esposo y un hijo ya que los demás han formado su propia familia, ella ayuda constantemente en la economía de su hogar y es por eso que todos los días trabaja mucho para tener una mejor calidad de vida.
El trabajo de María actualmente consiste en el alquiler de cuartos. Ha establecido en su terreno 8 cuartos que alquila. Para la construcción de estas habitaciones contó con el apoyo de su esposo, sus hijos y en ocasiones algunos obreros. Lleva en esta actividad más de 15 años. Ahora se encuentra en pleno acondicionamiento de algunas de las habitaciones cambiando algunas ventanas o puertas de madera que necesitan refacción. Por otra parte, tiene 2 mototaxis, de esta forma percibe un pago diario que le ayudan a solventar los gastos de su hogar.
Ambas actividades le llaman la atención porque se pueden recibir ingresos sin que ella realice mucho esfuerzo y en la comodidad de su hogar, se siente feliz porque puede colaborar en el sustento de su familia. Espera que le vaya bien en ambas labores para que pueda seguir trabajando con tranquilidad. Ahora solicita un monto de 2,000 mil soles, comprará madera que usará para construir puertas y ventanas que necesita refaccionar en algunos de los cuartos, asimismo comprará clavos y mallas metálicas para las ventanas.
texts.en:
María, who is 70, is a very hardworking and driven woman. She has been married for many years and has five children with her husband. She lives in the home they own with her husband and only one son, since the rest have started their own families. She constantly contributes to her household economy, so she works hard every day in order to have a better quality of life.

María currently works renting out rooms. She has set up eight rooms on her land which she rents. Her husband, her children, and ocasionally some laborers helped her build the rooms. She has been doing this for over fifteen years. Now she is right in the middle of remodeling some of the rooms by replacing some wooden windows and doors. On the side, she owns two mototaxis that allow her to earn a daily payment that helps her cover home expenses.

She is interested in both businesses because they allow her to earn an income from the comfort of her home and without much effort. She is happy to be able to contribute to her family's livelihood. She hopes both businesses go well for her so that she can keep working without any problems. She is now requesting a loan of 2,000 soles to purchase wood, which she will use to build doors and windows that need to be replaced in some of the rooms. She will also buy nails and screens for the windows.

loans.use: to purchase wood, screens, and nails.

loans.name: Oscar De Jesus

texts.es: Oscar de 29 años de edad, es un hombre muy comprometido con el bienestar de su familia la cual esta conformada por su esposa y un hijo menor de edad. Oscar trabaja como agricultor en su propio terreno en donde siembra frijoles y maíz, así también cultiva pipianes, con lo que garantiza un negocio muy estable que permite contar con todo lo necesario en su hogar. Para poder vivir mejor junto a su familia Oscar no solo debe proveer del sustento diario sino también brindarles seguridad y confianza en su hogar, por lo que solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el cual pueda realizarle mejoras a la estructura de su casa, reparar el techo, las puertas, y así mismo pintarla, de forma que pueda darle todo el mantenimiento necesario a su hogar en donde pueda vivir feliz y seguro  junto a su familia.
texts.en:
Oscar is 29 years old. He is devoted to his family's wellbeing, that is, his wife and one minor child. Oscar works as a farmer on his own land, where he grows beans and corn. He also grows pipian squash, which allows him to secure very stable business and obtain everything they need at home. 

In order to live better with his family, Oscar not only must provide for their daily needs, but also give them security and confidence at home, which is why he is requesting a loan from Integral. This loan will allow him to improve the structure of his house, repair the roof, the doors, and also paint it so that he can do all the maintenance his house needs and live happily and safely with his family.

loans.use: to make home improvements.

loans.name: Moses

texts.en:
Moses is a 31-year-old married man. He and his wife have three children, ranging in age from one to ten years old. He describes himself as a business-minded man.

To earn a living, he operates a food stall, where he sells fish. He has been involved in this business for three years. His business is located in a business area, and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as a lack of capital, which makes it difficult to improve the business.

He is now seeking a loan in the amount of 20,000 KES, which he would use to buy fish to sell to his customers. His goal is to expand and improve his business within five years. This would be his first loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to expand and improve his business by purchasing additional fish for his customers

loans.name: Mwanalima

texts.en: Mwanalima, 28, lives with her life partner and their four young children. She is very responsible and wants her children to have a good, stable life, so she works to help her husband. Mwanalima runs a small business selling dumplings and flat breads from her home. In addition, she also sells firewood.  She is requesting a loan to buy all the necessary basic ingredients like wheat flour, cooking oil, baking powder, food flavors and other items in order to make more dumplings and flat breads. That way she can visibly generate more income, which will be beneficial to her household.

loans.use: to buy basic ingredients like wheat flour, cooking oil, baking powder, food flavors, etc

loans.name: Mary

texts.en: Mary is a 32-year-old married woman. She has three children. She describes herself to be a humble woman. She operates a retail store where she sells cereal. She has been involved in this business for eight years. Her business is located within a potential business area and her primary customers are local residents. She describes her biggest business challenge to be insufficient funds for improving the business. She will use the KES 30,000 loan to buy cereals to sell. Her business goal is to run a wholesale business within five years. She hopes that in the future, she will have improved her business. This is her second loan with SMEP DTM.

loans.use: to buy cereals

loans.name: Nnee

texts.en:
Nnee is a 51-year-old married woman. She has four children with ages ranging from 14 years to 29 years. She describes herself to be humble and a God-fearing woman. She operates an internet café  where she provides internet services to customers and secretarial services. She has been involved in this business for 2 years. Her business is located within a busy business environment  and her primary customers are local residents. 

She describes her biggest business challenge to be lack of capital to diversify her business. She will use the Kes 45,000 loan to buy clothes to start selling to customers as she anticipates this coming holiday season. She will improve her internet café business with profits from the sale of the clothes. Her business goal is to improve her business within 5 years. This is her third loan with SMEP DTM after she took loans of Kes 10,000 and 20,000 which she managed to repay successfully.

loans.use: to buy second-hand clothes

loans.name: Julius

texts.en:
Julius is a progressive coffee farmer and mainly grows Arabica coffee. The 35-year-old man is married with five children who are all of school-going age. Julius applied for a loan of 1,000,000 Ugx to buy coffee seedlings for his coffee plantation. He hopes to increase his acreage to over 6 acres and will be able to harvest over 700 kgs by the end of 2013.

Julius also plans to start a small business for his wife so as to increase his household income.

loans.use: to buy coffee seedlings for his coffee 'shamba'

loans.name: Mwanatumu

texts.en:
Mwanatumu has had to go through a lot of adversity in life. Nonetheless, she has kept her entrepreneurial spirit that has allowed her to overcome these difficulties. She is a married mother of two children. She has a general store where she sells food stuffs, medicines, cleaning materials, etc., and that is how she generates income. She opened the store three years ago. 

To improve sales, Mwanatumu is seeking a loan to buy basic grains, foodstuffs, and other instant products and thus increase the variety of products she offers her customers so she can improve her sales.

Her dream is to have a bigger business so she can make more income and improve the quality of life for her two children.

loans.use: to buy basic grains, foodstuffs, and other instant products

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen is a 38-year-old married man. He has four children. He describes himself as a humble man. He operates a food stall where he sells french fries. He has been involved in this business for nine years. His business is located within a strategic business environment, and his primary customers are local residents. He describes his biggest business challenge as insufficient funds for improving the business. 

He will use the Kes 50,000 loan to buy potatoes for making french fries to sell. His business goal is to improve his business within five years. This is his second loan with SMEP DTM after taking a previous loan of Kes 20,000, which he managed to repay.

loans.use: to buy potatoes to make french fries to sell

loans.name: Angel

texts.es: Angel, de 33 años, es un hombre que le gusta mucho estar a lado de su familia y trabaja honradamente para poder brindarles una mejor calidad vida, es padre de un hijo de 10 años y juntos viven en su casa propia en donde comparte momentos de felicidad y su lucha por seguir adelante día a día. Angel, es un hombre precavido y esta cualidad le sirve mucho en su trabajo porque considera que es importante tener siempre calma y sobre todo buen tino para desempeñarse como mototaxista. Es consciente que cuando un pasajero accede a su vehículo, pone en sus manos también su seguridad y su vida para que llegue a su destino sano y salvo. Tiene 3 mototaxis que pone en alquiler y uno de ellos es conducido por él. Lleva realizando su trabajo por 2 años y en todo ese tiempo ganó mucha experiencia y además aprendió que el cliente siempre busca seguridad, rapidez, buen trato y precio justo. Le esta yendo muy bien en lo que hace, tiene muchas personas que lo contratan a veces por horas completas para transportarlos y así tiene mejores ganancias, ahora se está preparando para poder incrementar su trabajo y comprar una mototaxi más para alquilarlo y tener un ingreso adicional. Por tanto solicita un crédito para refaccionar algunas piezas de su mototaxi, que por el tiempo y el mal estado de la calles se empezaron a deteriorar, además desea comprar otro motocarro, por ello destinará parte del crédito en la primera letra de pago.
texts.en:
Angel, 33, is a man who very much likes to be with his family, and he works honorably to be able to give them a better quality of life.  He's the father of a 10-year-old and together they live in his own house where he shares moments of happiness and his struggle to get ahead every day.

Angel is a cautious man, and this quality serves him well in his job because he thinks it's important to always be calm and, especially, show good judgment to be able to work as a motorcycle taxi driver.  He's conscious of the fact that passengers who enter his vehicle are also putting their security and lives in his hands so they can arrive safe and healthy to their destination.

He has three motorcycle taxis that he rents, and one of them he himself drives.  He has done this job for two years and in all this time has gained a lot of experience.  He also learned that the customer always is looking for security, speed, good service, and a fair price.  It's going very well for him in what he does.  A lot of people hire him to transport them, sometimes for entire hours, so he has better profits.  Right now he's getting ready to be able to increase his work and buy another motorcycle taxi to rent and have an additional income.

He's requesting a loan to refurbish some parts of his motorcycle taxi that began to deteriorate over time and because of the bad condition of the streets.  He also wants to buy another motorcycle taxi, so he'll set aside part of the loan for the first payment.

loans.use: to buy motorcycle taxi parts and to make the first payment on a new vehicle

loans.name: Pastora

texts.es:
Pastora, tiene 43 años de edad, casada, tiene 4 hijos y vive con dos de ellos y su esposo en una aldea del municipio de Yoro.
Pastora tiene 6 años de tener su propio negocio de pulpería, donde vende productos de la canasta básica familiar, como es el arroz, frijoles, maíz, azúcar, manteca, huevos, frutas, verduras, refrescos, productos envasados, jabón, pelotas, baterías, pastillas, pan, etc. ella es una persona emprendedora con este negocio a sacado adelante a su familia. Ha decidido solicitar un préstamo por 18,000 Lempiras para surtir mas y aumentar las ventas y los ingresos, comprara granos básicos, manteca, azúcar, carnes y lácteos. Sus planes son mantener surtida la pulpería, para estar posesionado en su mercado por más tiempo y obtener ingresos para ayudar a su familia.
texts.en: Pastora, 43, is married and has four children; she lives with her husband and two of the children in a village in Yoro Municipality.  She’s had her own grocery store for six years where she sells basic staples like rice, beans, corn, sugar, lard, eggs, fruit, vegetables, soft-drinks, canned goods, soap, balls, batteries, pills, bread, etc.  She’s an enterprising person who has supported her family by means of this business.  She’d decided to request an 18,000 Lempira loan to increase stock and income.  She will buy basic grains, lard, sugar, meats and dairy products.  Her plan is to keep the store well-stocked to be well placed in the market longer and earn income to help her family.

loans.use: to buy stock merchandise for her store.

loans.name: Sayda

texts.es: Sayda, de 33 años, es una mujer joven, soñadora y muy amable, es conviviente con Fidel con quien tiene una pequeña hija de 2 años de edad, ella tiene una casa propia en donde vive a lado de su hija y su pareja con quien trabaja mucho para mejorar su calidad de vida. El trabajo de Sayda consiste en la venta de zapatos, sandalias, zapatillas y prendas de vestir, trabaja vendiendo entre sus amigos, vecinos y familiares, empezó desde hace unos 2 años y le va muy bien. Trabaja cómodamente sin descuidar a su pequeña hija. En esta temporada esta ofreciendo zapatos de fiestas y vestidos de niñas ya que se acerca las fiestas navideñas. Se siente muy a gusto haciendo lo que hace ya que le es retribuido en los buenos ingresos que tiene, pero ella necesita de alguna ayuda adicional ya que se quiere preparar para la campaña navideña próxima, le esta yendo bien ya que vende mucho pero le falta capital para invertir, por ello solicitará 2500 soles para comprar mayor cantidad de mercadería, entre las cosas que comprará será sandalias, zapatillas, zapatos, vestidos, polos, pantalones y algunos otros productos que solicita u distinguida clientela.
texts.en:
Sayda is a 33 year old young woman, an idealist and very friendly, who is the partner of Fidel, and she has a young daughter who is 2 years old. She lives in her own home at the side of her daughter and her partner with whom she works hard in order to improve their quality of life.

Sayda’s work consists of selling shoes, sandals, slippers, and clothing. She works selling to friends, neighbors and family. She began about two years ago and it is going well. She works easily without neglecting her young daughter. This season she is offering party shoes and children’s dresses as the holiday season is approaching. 

She is happy doing her work as it repays her in good income, but she needs some additional help as she wants to get ready for the coming holiday season. She is doing well as she sells a lot but she lacks capital to invest, so that is why she is asking for 2500 soles in order to buy more merchandise. Among the things that she will buy will be sandals, slippers, shoes, dresses, polos, pants and some other products that her distinguished clientele request.

loans.use: to buy sandals, slippers, shoes, dresses, polos, and pants for her business.

loans.name: Claudia Eleticia

texts.es: Claudia de 19 años de edad, es una joven trabajadora y madre responsable, ella vive junto a su esposo y su pequeño, a quien desea darle todo lo mejor que sea posible, por lo que trabaja muy duro junto a su esposo. Ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz y de sorgo, la cual es una planta que se puede usar para consumo humano y animal como también para elaborar escobas, esta plata les permite contar con una gama más amplia de clientes por lo que su cosecha es muy positiva para ellos. Claudia solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, con el deseo de contar con el dinero necesario para invertir en la compra de semillas para sembrar y así mismo para pagar el alquiler por adelantado de la parcela en la que elaboran su trabajo, ya que las circunstancias no les ha permitido comprar un terreno propio, lo cual esta dentro de sus planes futuros.
texts.en:
Claudia is 19 years old. She is a hardworking young woman and a responsible mother. She lives with her husband and her little one, whom she wants to give all the best, which is why she works very hard along with her husband. She works growing corn and sorghum, which is a plant that can be used for both human and animal consumption, as well as for making brooms. This plants allows them to have a wider array of customers, so this crop is very beneficial to them.

Claudia is requesting a loan from Integral because she wants to have enough money to invest in purchasing seeds to sow, and also to pay rent in advance for the lot where they work. Even though circumstances have not allowed them to purchase their own land, they plan to do so in the future.

loans.use: to purchase seeds to sow.

loans.name: Walter

texts.es: Walter de 26 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa y dos niños de 6 y 12 años de edad quienes se dedican a estudiar. Él es un hombre muy trabajador quien se dedica a sembrar diferentes tipos de granos básicos como: maíz, maicillo, frijoles y otros como sorgo el cual se utiliza para consumo humano y animal, cuando Walter finaliza el trabajo en su parcela, el busca empleo como jornal en otros terrenos para contar con ingresos extras que son de mucha ayuda para el sostenimiento de su hogar. Él solicita un préstamo con el fin de comprar mayor cantidad de semillas para sembrar, abonos, herramientas para elaborar este trabajo, pesticidas y otros materiales más que son de suma importancia en la siembra de granos básicos. Walter siempre busca nuevas oportunidades para mejorar su negocio, razón por la que confía en que este prestamos con INTEGRAL, será de mucha ayuda para él.
texts.en: Walter, 26, lives with his wife and two children who are 6 and 12 years old and are attending school.  He’s a very hardworking man who grows a variety of basic grains like corn, sorghum and beans and some like sorghum that’s used for both human and animal food.  When Walter finishes his work in the field he looks for work as a day laborer in other fields to earn extra income which helps quite a bit to support the home.  He’s asking for a loan to buy larger amounts of seeds to plant, manure and work tools, pesticides and other supplies that are of great importance for growing basic grains.  Walter is always looking for new opportunities to improve his business which is why he trusts that this Integral loan will be very useful for him.

loans.use: to buy manure and pesticide.

loans.name: Bernardo

texts.es: Bernardo de 62 años de edad, vive junto a su esposa quien trabaja como costurera y así mismo junto a dos hijos de 19 y 21 años de edad quienes trabajan y estudian. Bernardo es muy trabajador, y se dedica a la compra y venta de especias, las cuales comercializa de forma ambulante por diferentes pueblos y colonias, él es alguien que cuenta con muy buenos valores los que ha transmitido a su familia quienes que al igual que a él se esfuerzan para obtener lo que quieren. Bernardo solicita un préstamo para realizarle deferentes mejorar a su casa, ya que los fuertes vientos han dañado sus techos y así mismo por falta de ingresos se ha ido deteriorando poco a poco con el paso de los años, con el préstamo obtenido gracias a INTEGRAL, Bernardo mejorará tanto techo como paredes y así poder vivir más tranquilamente.
texts.en: Bernardo, 62, lives with his wife who works as a seamstress and with his two children who are 19 and 21 years old and who work and study.  Bernardo is very hardworking.  He works buying and selling spices that he sells from place to place in various towns and neighborhoods.  He’s someone with very good values who has passed them down to his family who like him strive to obtain what they want.  Bernardo is requesting a loan to make some home improvements because the strong winds have damaged his roof and because of the lack of income it’s been deteriorating gradually over time.  With the loan obtained thanks to Integral, Bernardo will repair the roof and the walls and will be able to live more at peace.

loans.use: to make some home improvements.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To pay the suppliers for the milk she will sell

loans.name: Winifred

texts.en:
Winifred is 21 years old and lives in Margibi County, which is noted for its rubber plantations. Winifred stopped her education at 10th grade. She is single and has a four-year-old child who is in school and lives at home. 

Since 2010 she has been selling pepper, cola nuts, rice and other items on a table in the market. She likes her business because it provides her with income. She is requesting a loan to purchase pepper, cola-nuts, rice and others items for her business. Her plans are to send her child to college and to build a house.

loans.use: to purchase pepper, cola-nuts, rice and others items for her business.

loans.name: Alice

texts.en:
Alice lives in Margibi County, which is noted for its fishing industry in Liberia. She is 48 years of age. She is married and has five children who live at home and attend school. Her husband is a fisherman. 

Since 1999 she been involved in business, and currently she is selling clothes and lappa (traditional cloth) in the local market. She started this business with money given to her by her husband. She learned this way of selling from people in the market. Her plan is to purchase more clothes and lappa to expand her business and to build a shop in the near future.

loans.use: to purchase more clothes and lappa to expand her business

loans.name: Sainbayar

texts.en:
Sainbayar is 41 years old and lives with her husband and two children in a ger in the Niseh district of Ulaanbaatar, Mongolia. Her husband, Tomorbaatar, age 44, has been a taxi driver for the past six years. Her son Batzorig, age 13, is a secondary school student, and her daughter Batzaya, age two, goes to kindergarten. Sainbayar has been working for a private cashmere company as a chef in the cafeteria for years. 

Her husband's car has not run for a month now, and he needs a replacement to run his taxi business smoothly without problems. She is now asking for 6,500,000 MNT to purchase an eco-friendly, electric and gas consuming car for her husband's taxi business. She and her husband are hardworking, responsible and honest people.

loans.use: to purchase an eco-friendly, electric and gas consuming car for her husband's taxi business

loans.name: Nikoloz

texts.en:
Nikoloz is from the Kareli district.  He is 47 years old and lives with his wife and four children.  Three of his children attend the local school and his eldest son helps the family in agricultural activities.  According to government estimations, the family belongs to the category of vulnerable poor and they receive monthly social assistance.

They own a plot of land where they grow onions, potatoes, haricots and sweet cherries.  He does all the relevant agricultural work to ensure a good quality of harvest.  The harvested products are sold locally.  In addition, Nikoloz is involved in an animal husbandry business and has two oxen and a milk cow.  The family produces cheese from the cow’s milk and sells it at the local open market.  Nikoloz is a very hard-working man with a great deal of experience in his chosen profession.

With this loan Nikoloz plans to purchase calves.  He will raise them and sell the grown calves for a much higher price.  This will bring additional income to the family.  Nikoloz plans to reinvest a portion of the anticipated increased income in the family farm and he will be use the other portion to improve the family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to purchase calves for resale.

loans.name: Gloria

texts.es:
Gloria, de 39 años, es una mujer amable y muy entusiasta, es conviviente con su pareja con quien tiene un hijo de 18 años, ella vive a lado de su hijo y su pareja junto a sus padres y hermanos cada uno en sus casas propias construidas en un amplio terreno. 
El trabajo que realiza Gloria es la venta de materiales de construcción, accesorios, entre  otros, para cumplir este trabajo tiene un espacio acondicionado en su propia casa, se dedica  a ésta actividad desde hace 10 años, este tiempo le ha servido para hacerse conocida en su sector, siendo su pequeña tienda una de las más concurridas de la localidad. Es así que trabaja todo el día y sus ganancias son muy alentadoras. 
Lo que le gusta de su trabajo es que su trabajo le permite solventar los gastos que se generan en su hogar, le ha permitido  seguir pagando los estudios de su hijo quien es su principal inspiración de seguir trabajando, además le gusta porque no trabaja con productos perecibles lo que le permite almacenar sus artículos sin ningún problema, tiene planes de seguir incrementado su negocio con más artículos y abrir otro local. Por ello necesita de un crédito para concretar sus planes, es por ello que necesita 2,000 mil soles para comprar mercadería para su tienda de ferretería principalmente comprará tubos de conexión para agua y desagüe y además complementará su negocio con la compra de calaminas ya que sus clientes le exigen este producto.
texts.en:
Gloria is 39 years old and is a very enthusiastic and friendly woman.  She is married and has an 18 year old son.  She lives with them, alongside her parents and brothers, each in their own home built on a large piece of land.  

Gloria sells building materials, accessories, and other things.  She has a space set aside in her home and has been doing this for ten years.  She has used this time to become well known in the sector and her store is one of the best known.  She works here every day and her earnings are encouraging.

What she enjoys about her work is that is allows her to pay her household expenses and her son’s tuition.  He is her main inspiration for continuing to work.  She also likes it because she doesn’t work with perishables, so she can stock up with no worries.  She plans to expand her business with more items and open a new location, so she needs a loan to solidify her plans.  She needs 2,000 PEN to buy merchandise for her hardware store, mainly water pipes and corrugated tin that her customers are requesting.

loans.use: to buy inventory.

loans.name: Maria Lilian

texts.es: María de 24 años de edad, es una joven emprendedora quien trabaja muy duro junto a su esposo por llevar el sustento diario a su hogar y darle todo lo necesario a su único hijo. María trabaja comercializando frutas en el mercado de la zona en que reside obteniendo ganancias justas para el mantenimiento de su casa. Ella reside en una zona rural en donde la electricidad es un servicio que pocas personas poseen, María es una de las personas que no cuenta con luz eléctrica en su hogar, viéndose obligada a utilizar velas para iluminar por las noches, lo que la hace incurrir en gastos extras, tomando en cuenta que las velas pueden ocasionar en algunas casos accidentes. Por esto ella solicita un préstamo a INTEGRAL, para poder invertir en la compra de una lámpara ecológica, que representa una gran ayuda para María ya que es amigable con el medio ambiente y también es ahorrativa y segura, lo que le brinda beneficios muy positivos a su hogar porque podrán contar con energía autorrenovable y lo mejor de todo a un bajo precio.
texts.en: María, 24, is a young entrepreneur who works hard alongside her husband to provide daily sustenance for her home and to provide their only son with everything he needs.  María works selling fruit in her local market earning fair profits to support her house.  She lives in a rural zone where electricity is something few people have.  María is one of those people who does not have electricity at home and must use candles for light at night which causes extra expenses; in addition candles can sometimes cause accidents.  Because of this, she’s asking Integral for a loan to buy an ecological lamp that represents a great help for María because it’s environmentally friendly, saves energy and is safe which means very positive benefits for her home because they can have reliable, renewable energy at best of all a low price.

loans.use: to buy a lamp for the house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy a quality dairy cow.

loans.name: Juma

texts.en:
Juma is a married man.  He has six children between the ages of 12 and 21 years.  He describes himself as a determined man. 

He operates a retail business where he sells firewood.  He has been involved in this business for five years.  His business is located within a strategic and viable business environment and his primary customers are local residents.  He describes his biggest business challenge to be the high cost of transportation.  He will use the loan of 100,000 KES to buy firewood to sell.  His business goal is to improve his business within five years. 

This is his second loan with SMEP DTM.  He has fully repaid his previous loan of 50,000 KES.

loans.use: to buy firewood to sell.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase fruits and vegetables to resell.

loans.name: Sofia

texts.en:
Sofia is 45 years old.  She is a humble, hardworking person living with her children in the town of Msambweni, which is located in the Coastal region of Kenya.  She operates a food stall, which she has been running for the last two years and her efforts have already produced good results. 

Sofia is requesting a loan from Yehu in order to have the money needed to buy more ingredients like wheat flour, corn flour, beans and cassava.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like wheat flour, corn flour, beans and cassava.

loans.name: Baya

texts.en:
Baya is a married man.  He has five children between the ages of 8 and 25 years.  He describes himself to b a caring and responsible man. 

He operates a Nissan through which he provides transportation services.  He has been involved in this business for three years.  His business is located within a strategic business area and his primary customers are local residents.  He describes his biggest business challenge to be traffic jams on the road that consume a lot of fuel.  He will use the loan of 75,000 KES to buy spare parts for his Nissan.  His business goal is to own another Nissan within five years. 

This is his third loan with SMEP DTM.  He fully repaid his previous loan of 50,000 KES.

loans.use: to buy spare parts for his Nissan.

loans.name: Bibi

texts.en:
Bibi, 36, lives with her husband and their four children, three of whom are attending a local school. She is a responsible woman, friendly and fully committed to whatever she is doing.

Bibi operates a produce sales business where she has a small stall that is an extension of her residential house. Bibi sells a variety of fruits and vegetables. She has operated the business for two years and can rely on the loyal set of customers that she has gained in those years. She says that her hopes for the future are to grow her business and provide a decent life for herself and her family.

She is applying for a Yehu loan that she will use to buy fruits and vegetables like cabbages, onions, and kale, which she will resell.

loans.use: to buy fruits and vegetables like cabbages, onions, and kale, which she will resell.

loans.name: Mary

texts.en:
Mary is a 49-year-old woman. She is married and has three children. She is a second-hand car dealer. She has been in the business for 23 years and she gets a monthly income of 30,000 Kenya shillings (KES).
 
This will be Mary's fifth loan with KADET LTD, and she plans to use the entire loan to purchase car accessories like mobile phone car holders, car sprays, and sunscreen sheds for resale. She plans to use the profits to invest back into her business and improve the business. 

In the future, she wants to be a successful business lady operating in a major town.

loans.use: to buy car accessories like car sprays and sunscreen sheds.

loans.name: C2331 Tuzamurane 2 Group

texts.en:
Gilberte is 36 years old and is a widow with two children between the ages of 14 and 16 years old. She sells products like rice, sugar, soap, and salt in her business. Her business is well organized and she works from 8 a.m. until 7 p.m. every day of the week.

Gilberte is the leader of the group which is called "C2331 TUZAMURANE 2" in the local language. In the picture, she is the woman in the middle holding a paper in her hand. Gilberte has 4 years of experience in this work. 

Gilberte has requested a loan from Kiva lenders via Vision Finance Company in order to purchase more quantity of fruits and vegetables for resale. With the profits she earns, she plans to save money for her future, to pay her childrens' school fees, and to pay for medical insurance.

loans.use: to purchase more quantities of rice, sugar, soap, salt, and other products to resell.

loans.name: Espiritu Emprendedor Group

texts.es:
Este grupo solidario denominado Espíritu Emprendedor es una organización conformado por tres mujeres que buscan mejorar su calidad de vida, basando su esfuerzo en el amor a su familia.

En este grupo la presidenta es la Sra. Margoth, ella tiene 26 años, es madre soltera, Margoth se define como una persona sencilla, humilde, responsable y con muchas ganas de salir adelante y lograr emprender su propio negocio, esta consiente que todo lo que hace es por el amor a su madre y a su pequeño hijo.

El crédito solicitado a Fodemi lo van a invertir en la compra de pollos y de cerdos para la crianza y la venta, con el dinero que sobre invertirán en la adecuación de los  corrales donde vivirán estos animalitos, este crédito les ayudará a incrementar sus ingresos y será beneficioso para su familia.

El sueño que Margoth tiene es comprase un terreno más grande y construir un galpón de pollos para criarlos y venderlos y con esas ganancias poder construir su propia casa y ayudar a su madre y darle la mejor herencia que una madre puede dar a su hijo, la educación.
texts.en:
This solidarity group, Espíritu Emprendedor, is an organization made up of three women who are looking to improve their quality of life, basing their effort on love for their families.

The president of this group is Margoth, 26, a single mother.  Margoth is a modest, humble, and responsible person who very much wants to get ahead and be able to set up her own business.  She's aware that everything she does is because she loves her mother and her young son.

They're going to invest the loan they're requesting from FODEMI in buying chickens and pigs to raise and sell.  With the money that's left over they'll invest in adapting the sheds where these little animals live.  This loan will help them increase their income and will be beneficial to their family.

Margoth's dream is to buy herself a bigger plot of land and build a chicken coop to raise and sell the chickens.  With those profits she'll be able to build her own house, help her mother, and give her child an education, the best legacy a mother can leave.

loans.use: to buy chickens and pigs and to adapt the corrals

loans.name: Photo Group

texts.en:
Zeinab is the featured borrower of Al Photo Group. She got together with her other group members to take this Al Majmoua loan, because they have always been neighbors and friends. She is the one seated on the right. She has been working preparing homemade food for 20 years. She does well in her business because of the good quality of the products she prepares and sells, in addition to her affordable prices and special customer care.

Zeinab is a 39-year-old married woman and mother of 4 children (Mirabelle 14 (F), Abdallah 12 (M), Abbass 3 (M), Myriam 2 (F)). Zeinab is a hard worker who puts so much effort in helping her husband make a living and cover their childrens' expenses. She has excellent taste that everyone recommends, and her cleanliness is a remarkable point to talk about.

Zeinab is applying for a loan from Kiva partner Al Majmoua in order to buy a new freezer to store her products and keep them fresh upon her customers' request. Because she works in large quantities, she has to prepare a suitable place to save her cooked items.

Zeinab is hoping to open her own homemade food restaurant which is highly requested nowadays among employees who prefer requesting healthy food delivery instead of junk food.

Yolla is a 28-year-old married woman. She is the one seated on the left. She has been working as a hairdresser from her house for 3 years, and is requesting a loan from Al Majmoua to buy a special tattoo machine and a newly released makeup collection. She wants to open her own beauty salon in the future.

Samia is a 34-year-old single woman, who has been working as a wedding and special events photographer for 2 years. She is applying for a loan to buy an advanced zoom for her camera in order to take high quality pictures. She is looking forward to open her dream studio.

loans.use: to buy a new freezer to store her products and keep them fresh.

loans.name: Damaris

texts.en:
Damaris is a twenty-eight-year-old woman. She is single and a mother to one child. She has a mushroom farming business in the outskirts of Kawangware. She has been in the business for three years now, and she earns a monthly income of eighty thousand shillings.
